title: The new Client is crashing my monitor
body: Hello, Every time i load in for a game my screen goes black and my monitor popps out a window saying invalid format, this only began happening just as i updated to the patch 7.1  someone please help meh <3 {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: This sounds related to an issue that's currently up on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  The workaround at the moment is to try pressing Alt+Enter in-game.  Let me know if that helps.

Yes, it worked but only on the 8th try of me spamming buttons, when I pressed it the image of the game flashed on the monitor and it came back to the message. Eventually it worked, thank you for your help, is this being fixed or am I always going to need to spam my buttons for my game to work xD... And also when it DOES work it is in windowed  format which laggs me out so i cant really play.. Is there a way to open in in full screen more even if it is bugging out and not working?{{item:3070}}

RE: It is still broken, someone please help me.
A day later I Checked that all of my drivers are up to date. I have re-installed League of legends. I have been running many programs which checked and confirmed that all of my drivers were up to date as much as they can be. Know i do not see the issue in my computer, I'm sure that it is something to do with the patch as this only started happening as soon as I upgraded to patch 7.1. However I am able to run the game because of the  Alt+enter trick that @Porocles told me to do .This opens up the game in windowed screen. However I am not able to play the game in windowed screen because I get very high fps spikes which makes the game unplayable, I did try running it in borderless more which lagged out my PC even more. Just for the information my computer is really old, I do think this might be a reason for the game not being able to open in full screen, Cant my GPU be optimized for the new standards of the 7.1 patch???? 
Please someone help, I would love to get back into playing my favorite game and spending a lot of money on the upcoming goodness.
I would love to get help from someone, thank you.

Jenya{{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}}

so bro it worked for me
just go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config 
and open game.cfg and change WindowMode=1 or 0 to WindowMode=2
And the game will work in borderless fullscreen
if ur issues still continues Just post again and i will try my best to solve the prob



                                                                                        Frm a fellow summoner

Btw try lowering ur video setting on after changing windowmode= to windowmode 2
and if it is still lagging u could gimme ur skype or something and i will be happy to help
or just add me on EUW server
I m sure u will e able to play again
